page.title: 19TOURISM.
page.content: {Llandudno}is one of the rare towns to have the combination of countryside and seaside within a couple of miles of each other.Our survey showed that the highest percentage choice for coming to Llandudno was the seashore.This was 24%,followed closely by the countryside 22%.15% thought the area nice for walking.Coach tours,castles and the night-life only covered for 3% of the survey respectively.Shopping covered 8%,this could be becuse many people from the surrounding valleys come to the town for its chain stores.There are no large chain stores down the Conwy Valley.Theatres and night-life showed only 7%,Llandudno caters mainly for the elderly tourist and thus the night-life is very limited.There are only two theatres in the town.
